description: Explore how blockchain technology is redefining data ownership and sovereignty in the digital age. Discover the aspects of decentralization, security, and smart contracts, as well as challenges including scalability, privacy, and regulatory issues.
keywords: Blockchain, data sovereignty, digital age, decentralization, data security, smart contracts, data privacy, regulatory challenges, GDPR, data ownership
title: Blockchain and Data Sovereignty: Redefining Ownership in the Digital Age
